### Tender Details

*   Expected Contract End Date: April 1, 2026

### Contract Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of Transport Canada, Port Hardy Airport, require a qualified Electrical Contractor to maintain the low and high voltage systems essential to airport operations.

### Work Scope

The contractor will be responsible for:

*   Scheduling and executing preventative maintenance work-orders
*   Performing preventative maintenance activities to ensure system reliability
*   Undertaking breakdown maintenance to restore system functionality

### Contractual Requirements

*   The contract is expected to be completed within the designated timeframe.
*   The contractor must meet the requirements of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other applicable trade agreements.
*   Interested bidders may access the contract documents through [**link**](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19368007).
